title: Patreon and Tips!
content: Those who want to help buy testing hardware or just give me a tip, you can do it by sending donations to my Binance account. I also made a Patreon account where I share private builds and tests. Here you can find updates for the Pineapple Nano and builds to improve stability on 5g.

title: WPC v4 released
content:
Today we are launching the final version of this project. It fixes the last bugs that could be experienced depending on what setup we have mounted.

Both v3 and v4 of the project manage to generate hardware equal to the real one. All the bugs fixed for this release were also in the real hardware.

title: WPC v3 released
content:
Today I released v3 of the project, where the main changes are: ðŸ“£

  • Fixed all the problems found in v2
  • Expanded the compatibility list from 125 to 211 devices
  • Added support for mipsel architecture
  • Online firmware updater

title: New Modules Community Repo
content: We are launching an official repo where you will find module updates! You can collaborate by sending your pull requests here. ðŸ“£

title: Full list of supported devices
content: ðŸš¨ We publish a list with all supported devices. You can check it here. ðŸ“¡

title: Update OpenWrt version
content: Update OpenWrt version to 19.07.7! Check for new builds in the downloads repo! ðŸš€

title: New targets
content:
Add support for:

  • Zyxel NBG6716
  • NETGEAR R6100, WNDR3700 V4 and WNDR4300 V1

title: Project Updates
content:
Updates in:

  • Build scripts
  • Documentation to replicate the method
  • Example builds
  • Finished builds were added to be able to use the project in several router models! ðŸ¦„

You can send Pull Requests for improvements and support for new routers to the project repo

title: GL-AR150 updates
content:
New builds using the Universal Wifi pineapple hardware cloner have been released.
They were made with OpenWrt 19.07.2 and 19.07.7! ðŸš€
In both you can find the new panel.

title: Panel updates!
content:
As a side project I made wifi-pineapple-panel where I fixed various bugs in it and improved overall performance! ðŸ› 

Thanks to this we have:

  • Tabs in the most complex sections
  • PineAP configurable from the panel
  • Manual upgrade section
  • And other improvements in Recon, Clients, PineAP, Logging, Network and Advanced!

This is why this panel will be used in the 'Universal Wifi pineapple hardware cloner' project
